S04n439:1: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgatasya tārāyaṇamūle viharataḥ prathamābhisaṃbuddhasyaikasya rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya lokānuvartanāṃ pratyetadabhavat-gambhīro batāyaṃ mayā dharmo'dhigato'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ śāntaḥ praśānta upaśāntaḥ praṇīto durdṛśo duranubodho'tarko'vitarkāvacaraḥ |
S04n439:2: alamāryaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyo yaduta sarvopadhiniḥsargo'vedito'niveditaḥ sarvaveditanirodhaḥ paramārtho'nālayaḥ |
S04n439:25: te imu śruṇitva hi dharmu śraddadhanti ||3 ||
S04n439:27: so pi na vidyate yasya nāstibhāvāḥ |
S04n439:32: na ca maya pratilabdha eṣa kṣāntī
S04n439:33: yatra na ātma na sattva naiva jīvaḥ ||5 ||
S04n439:35: mriyati na ceha na kaści jāyate vā |
S04n439:42: eva ca ayu dharma grāhyu me syāt
S04n439:43: saci mama brahma krame nipatya yācet |
S04n439:46: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgatastasmin samaye ūrṇākośātprabhāmutsṛjati sma yayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturmahatā suvarṇavarṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo'bhūt ||
S04n439:47: atha khalu daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasrādhipatiḥ śikhī mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvenaiva tathāgatasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāsīt-alpotsukatāyai bhagavataścittamabhinataṃ na dharmadeśanāyāmiti |
S04n439:49: atha khalu śikhī mahābrahmā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tadanyān brahmakāyikān devaputrānāmantrayate sma— naśyati batāyaṃ mārṣā loko vinaśyati,
S04n439:50: yatra hi nāma tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyālpotsukatāyai cittamabhināmayati na dharmadeśanāyām |
S04n439:52: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī mahābrahmā aṣṭaṣaṣṭyā brāhmaṇaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n439:53: upasaṃkramya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya prāñjalistathāgatametadavocat naśyati batāyaṃ bhagavan lokaḥ,
S04n439:55: yatra hi nāma tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyālpotsukatāyai cittamabhināmayati na dharmadeśanāyām |
S04n439:58: santi sattvāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ śaktā bhavyāḥ pratibalāḥ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājñātum |
S04n439:92: adhivāsayati sma bhikṣavastathāgataḥ śikhino brahmaṇastūṣṇībhāvena sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānugrahārthamanukampāmupādāya ||
S04n439:93: atha khalu śikhī mahābrahmā tathāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā divyaiścandanacūrṇairagurucūrṇaiśca tathāgatamabhyavakīrya prītiprāmodyajātastatraivāntaradhāt ||
S04n439:94: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasya dharmālokasyādarotpādanārthaṃ śikhinaśca mahābrahmaṇaḥ punaḥ punastathāgatādhyeṣaṇayā kuśalamūlavivṛddhyarthaṃ dharmasya cātigambhīrodāratāmupādāya punarapyekasya rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyāyamevaṃrūpaṃ cetovitarko'bhūt-gambhīraḥ khalvayaṃ mayā dharmo'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ sūkṣmo nipuṇo duranubodhaḥ atarko'tarkāvacaraḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīko durdṛśaḥ sarvopadhiniḥsargaḥ sarvasaṃskāropaśamaḥ sarvatamopacchedaḥ śūnyatānupalambhastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam |
S04n439:99: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena punarapi tathāgatasyetadamevaṃrūpeṇa cetaḥ-parivitarkamājñāya yena śakro devānāmindrastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n439:100: upasaṃkramya śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-yatkhalu kauśika jānīyāstathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyālpotsukatāyai cittaṃ nataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām |
S04n439:104: yatra hi nāma tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyālpotsukatāyai cittaṃ nataṃ na dharmasaṃprakāśanāyām |
S04n439:108: sādhu mārṣeti śakro brahmā bhaumāśca devā antarīkṣāścāturmahārājakāyikāstrāyatriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā ābhāsvarā bṛhatphalā śubhakṛtsnā saṃbahulāni ca śuddhāvāsakāyika devaputraśatasahasrāṇyatikrāntavarṇā atikrāntāyāṃ rātrau kevalaṃ tārāyaṇamūlaṃ divyena varṇena divyenāvabhāsenāvabhāsya yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāman |
S04n439:109: upasaṃkramya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya caikānte tasthuḥ ||
S04n439:110: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro yena tathāgatastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tathāgataṃ gāthayābhituṣṭāva—
S04n439:111: uttiṣṭha vijitasaṃgrāma prajñākārā timisrā vivara loke |
S04n439:112: cittaṃ hi te vimuktaṃ śaśiriva pūrṇo grahavimuktaḥ ||17 ||
S04n439:114: atha khalu śikhī mahābrahmā śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-naiva kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā adhyeṣyante dharmacakrapravartanatāyai yathā tvamadhyeṣase ||
S04n439:115: atha khalu śikhī mahābrahmā ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena tathāgatastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tathāgataṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣata—
S04n439:116: uttiṣṭha vijitasaṃgrāma prajñākārā timisrā vivara loke |
S04n439:117: deśaya tvaṃ mune dharmaṃ ājñātāro bhaviṣyanti ||18 ||
S04n439:118: evamukte bhikṣavastathāgataḥ śikhinaṃ mahābrahmāṇametadavocat-gambhīraḥ khalvayaṃ mahābrahman mayā dharmo'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ sūkṣmo nipuṇaḥ peyālaṃ yāvatsā me syātparamā viheṭhā |
S04n439:119: api ca me brahmannime gāthe'bhīkṣṇaṃ pratibhāsaḥ—
S04n439:121: na taṃ drakṣyanti rāgāndhā alaṃ tasmātprakāśitum ||19 ||
S04n439:124: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī mahābrahmā śakraśca devānāmindrastathāgataṃ tūṣṇībhūtaṃ viditvā sārdhaṃ tairdevaputrairduḥkhitā durmanāstatraivāntaradhāyiṣuḥ ||
S04n439:125: trirapi ca tathāgatasyālpotsukatāyai cittaṃ namayati sma ||
S04n439:126: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena māgadhakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmimānyevaṃrūpāṇi pāpakāni akuśalāni dṛṣṭigatānyutpannānyabhūvan |
S04n439:135: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī mahābrahmā tathāgatasyaivamevaṃrūpaṃ cittavitarkamājñāya māgadhakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāmimāni dṛṣṭigatāni viditvā atikrāntāyāṃ rātrāvabhisaṃkrāntena varṇena sarvāvantaṃ tārāyaṇamūlaṃ divyenāvabhāsenāvabhāsya yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n439:136: upasaṃkramya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandyaikāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena tathāgatastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tathāgataṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n439:145: na te mune sadṛśa ihāsti loke
S04n439:189: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgataḥ sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā vyavalokayan sattvān paśyati sma hīnamadhyapraṇītānuccanīcamadhyamān svākārān suviśodhakān durākārān durviśodhakānuddhāṭitajñānavipañcijñān padaparamāṃstrīn sattvarāśīnekaṃ mithyatvaniyatamekaṃ samyaktvaniyatamekamaniyatam |
S04n439:190: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre sthitaḥ paśyati jalaruhāṇi kānicidudakāntargatāni kānicidudakasamāni kānicidudakābhyudgatāni,
S04n439:191: evameva bhikṣavastathāgataḥ sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā vyavalokayan paśyati sma sattvāṃstriṣu rāśiṣu vyavasthitān ||
S04n439:192: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat-deśayeyaṃ cāhaṃ dharmaṃ na vā deśayeyam |
S04n439:194: deśayeyaṃ cāhaṃ vā dharmaṃ na vā deśayeyam |
S04n439:201: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'niyatarāśivyavasthitān sattvānārabhya mahākaruṇāmavakrāmayati sma ||
S04n439:202: atha khalu tathāgata ātmanaścemaṃ samyagjñānamadhikṛtya śikhinaśca mahābrahmaṇo'dhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā śikhinaṃ mahābrahmāṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n439:207: atha khalu śikhī mahābrahmā tathāgatasyādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntaradhāt ||
S04n439:208: atha khalu bhikṣavo bhaumā devāstasyāṃ velāyāmantarīkṣebhyo devebhyo ghoṣamudīrayanti sma,
S04n439:209: śabdamanuśrāvayanti sma-adya mārṣā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakrapravartanāyai pratiśrutam |
S04n439:210: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S04n439:211: parihāsyante bata bho mārṣā asurāḥ kāyāḥ |
S04n439:214: evamevāntarīkṣā devā bhaumebhyo devebhyaḥ pratiśratya cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma |
S04n439:220: śabdamanuśrāvayanti sma-adya mārṣāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakrapravartanāyai pratiśrutam |
S04n439:221: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S04n439:222: parihāsyante bata bho mārṣā asurāḥ kāyāḥ |
S04n439:225: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tanmuhurtaṃ tallavaṃ yāvadbahmakāyikā devāstasmādbhaumādārabhya ekavāgekanirnāda ekanirghoṣo'bhyudgato'bhūt-adya mārṣāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakrapravartanāyai pratiśrutamiti ||
S04n439:226: atha khalu bhikṣavo dharmaruciśca nāmā bodhivṛkṣadevatā dharmakāyaśca dharmamatiśca dharmacārī ca,
S04n439:227: ete catvāro bodhivṛkṣadevatāstathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyaivamāhuḥ-kva bhagavān dharmacakraṃ pravartiṣyatīti?
S04n439:231: santyanyāni bhagavan mahānagarāṇi ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāni subhikṣāṇi ramaṇīyāni ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi udyānavanaparvatapratimaṇḍitāni |
S04n439:234: ṣaṣṭiṃ yajñasahasrakoṭinayutā ye tatra yaṣṭā mayā
S04n439:238: buddhā koṭisahasra naikanavatiḥ pūrve smarāmī aha
